name: Drampa
description: It has a compassionate personality, but if it is angered, it completely destroys its surroundings with its intense breath.

abilities.name: Berserk
abilities.effect: Whenever this Pokémon takes damage from a move that causes its HP to drop below 50%, its Special Attack rises by one stage.
abilities.description: Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a  hit that causes its HP to become half or less.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.effect: Whenever a grass-type move hits this Pokémon, its Attack rises one stage, negating any other effect on it.
abilities.description: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.

abilities.name: Cloud Nine
abilities.effect: While this Pokémon is in battle, weather can still be in play, but will not have any of its effects.  This ability functions identically to air lock.
